summary: Inspired by Bloodborne screenshots and dark fantasy artwork.  Updated 1/26/18 for .319 binary.  Compatible with Vanilla Skyrim and NLA plugin
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=5][/size][/font][/center][size=5][size=4][center][/center][/size][/size][center][/center][center][size=5]Bloodborne ENB

[size=4]by mobiusbelmont[/size][/size][/center][size=5][size=4]

[/size][/size][size=5][size=4]Dark Fantasy and Night Eye Compatible ENB presest based on screenshots from Bloodborne, now with three editions to choose from:
[center]﻿[/center][center]﻿[youtube]ug9adReCkgA[/youtube][/center]

[size=5][b]Original edition[/b][/size]:  Bleak and Gloomy days and nights with lots of fog and foreboding red sunlight.  

[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/48affbd9c0771d26b201db11c780a7e9/tumblr_od3hxlSmdb1s2ptqso2_400.jpg[/img][img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/9d03d31c03b89428147d07666bbfc196/tumblr_od3hxlSmdb1s2ptqso9_400.jpg[/img]
[img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/e885231e737334c0af8a204580089159/tumblr_od3hxlSmdb1s2ptqso5_400.jpg[/img][img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/c98ca51244094f066338ab814f89adc3/tumblr_od3hxlSmdb1s2ptqso3_400.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][/center]

[/size][/size][center][size=5][size=4][size=5][b]Old Hunters Edition[/b][/size]: yellow sun/warmer palette

[youtube]VQieoazEYgU[/youtube]

[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/ac9b6c18d70e4a60930daa3d795eed13/tumblr_odt5brtfk71s2ptqso4_400.jpg[/img][/size][/size][size=5][size=4][img width=392,height=229]https://66.media.tumblr.com/8155695a6851590ec88d9b9cb299a11e/tumblr_odlq9toT5I1s2ptqso3_1280.jpg[/img][/size][/size][size=5][size=4][img width=404,height=246]https://68.media.tumblr.com/2b0ff93a9da801ad05d0c81b07fff2e7/tumblr_od3r0yjNIO1s2ptqso4_540.jpg[/img][img width=403,height=248]https://68.media.tumblr.com/c68bbe78b82adba76b790843f7b73c3d/tumblr_odv86hJC6l1s2ptqso3_540.jpg[/img][/size][/size][/center][size=5][size=4]







[/size][/size][center][size=5][size=4]

[size=5][b]Plague Edition[/b][/size]: [/size][/size][size=5][size=4]Cooler palette and very desaturated

[youtube]UucxzMsM5rg[/youtube]

[/size][/size][size=5][size=4][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/389b07fa80eea5458ff3e47ee2f75c4a/tumblr_oddcmgntpd1s2ptqso3_400.jpg[/img]

﻿[img width=402,height=230]https://66.media.tumblr.com/00c8c19ebc133e15b81701a966af6978/tumblr_odlpy4h2F71s2ptqso4_540.jpg[/img] ﻿

﻿[img width=377,height=230]https://68.media.tumblr.com/340abad21ce30c6200b9535191e3052f/tumblr_odlpswu5aN1s2ptqso2_540.jpg[/img][/size][/size][/center][size=5][size=4]
[/size][/size]
[size=5][size=4]

[/size][/size]
[size=5][size=4][size=5]GENERAL INFO: 
[/size]- [size=3]This is my best attempt at designing an ENB preset that resembles the Bloodborne and my favorite pieces of dark fantasy artwork.  It is not meant to be realistic.  While inspired by the game Bloodborne, this ENB will not make your game 100% identical to it (close in a lot of ways IMO)

- This ENB does NOT feature custom weathers 

- Vivid Weathers version now available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86100/?]here[/url]

- Currently supporting binary .319.  [/size][/size][/size][size=5][size=4][size=3][size=5][size=4][size=3]Dusk/Dawn is NOT enabled [/size][/size][/size]

- All versions are compatible with the Night Eye ability

- Here is my list of highly recommended mods I use with this preset
  Darkend
  Realistic Water two
  watercolor for ENB
  ELFX interiors only(no exteriors) or Further Dark Dungeons
  True Storms
  Vivid Fogs and Clouds
  Technicolor Alchemy Overhaul
  Dark Fantasy Overhaul, Dark Forests of Skyrim OR Enhanced Landscapes with Dark Fantasy option
  The Great Forest of Whiterun Hold
  Beyond Reach
  DynDOLOD

[/size][size=3]- Thread fixes are disabled by default, enable them if you need/want to.  I suggest leaving them disabled until you have an issue with a game crashing in a certain area.  They are a life saver



[/size][size=5]INSTALLATION:
[/size]
[size=3]1.Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost files from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]here[/url] to your Skyrim folder (use the latest wrapper version v319)

2.Copy and paste the Bloodborne ENB files to your Skyrim folder.  Choose only ONE edition


3. Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values: (OR BETTER YET, JUST USE BETHINI AND ENABLE 'ENB MODE')
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0
fGamma = 1.0


4. Make sure anti-aliasing and anisotropic filtering are set to 0 in the Skyrim Launcher (pretty much standard
practice for any ENB preset).  In game brightness should be set to 0

5.  SMAA antialiasing and Depth of Field are enabled by default. 
NOTE: If you use the [u][b]STEAM overlay[/b][/u] then you need to make an adjustment in the injector.ini file: under [misc] and change 'weird_steam_hack = 0 to 1:
[misc]
;set to 1 to improve steam overlay compatibility
***weird_steam_hack = change this from 0 to [b]1[/b]


[/size][/size][/size][size=5][size=4][size=3]CONSULT THE STEP GUIDE FOR ENB FOR MORE INFORMATION ON HOW YOU SHOULD CONFIGURE YOUR  enblocal files for YOUR RIG

Check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?]this guide[/url] by Sthaagg for configuring ENB and your Skyrim

[/size]
[size=3][size=5]CREDITS:[/size]
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series Developer (http://enbdev.com/index_en.html)
original Depth of Field by matso
high quality Depth of Field tweaks by Kobalk and team (from the amazing Rampage ENB)
SweetFX by CeeJay, TV shaders by [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/sweetfx/comments/28exv0/boulotaur2024s_injector_with_151_shaders_x64/]Boulotaur2024[/url]
ultimate shader effect add-on by Miratheus (http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3274)
palette textures by yours truly


[/size]













[/size]
[/size]
